name: ocserv
desc: OpenConnect VPN server (ocserv), a server for the OpenConnect VPN client

options.name: config
options.desc: Configuration content to start an OCServ server.  For a full configuration reference,please refer to the onlinedocumentation ( https://ocserv.gitlab.io/www/manual.html ),the openconnect recipes ( https://github.com/openconnect/recipes )or  man ocserv .
